data.message:
I love this advert.
But I really miss that magical wink by santa at the very end.

replies.message:
Hi Tallulah, we’re delighted to see so many people were watching closely when the Holidays Are Coming ad returned to screens on Friday night. The ad has been on screens for twenty-two years but we have to admit that Santa has actually never winked at the end of the commercial.
With or without Santa’s wink, we can confirm that the holidays are indeed coming and the festive season has officially begun.
Coca-Cola there’s never been a wink?!? Utter tosh!
Coca-Cola  I was just wondering why you hadn't managed to reply to my comment! I wonder if you can find it and see what you think!
Chloë Ama your comment is irrelevant and boring

Martin Moore https://youtube.com/watch?v=ADZIr5HTU_M 

See for yourself! :D He does move though and drink coke.
